post.text:
Ser presidente de los Estados Unidos no es un trabajo para principiantes. 

Conoce la valiosa experiencia que Hillary tuvo como secretaria de Estado.

comment.author: Miranda
comment.text: "Stronger Together" must be Hillary's slogan, she came up with for not divorcing, Bill over his many many extra marital affairs! She has and will always just be in it for here she and herself alone! not the Mirandamerican people or truth justice and personal integrity!
